setting.title: Subscription
setting.columnlabels: Customer Name,Start Date,End Date,Notification Type,Currency,Services,User Name,Remarks,Opportunity Id,password,Subscription Code,Is Renew,Is Decline,Parent Code,Subscription Parent Id,Subscription Status
setting.query: SELECT * FROM tbl_subscription JOIN tbl_subscriptionstatus ON subscription_subscriptionstatusid=subscriptionstatus_subscriptionstatusid JOIN tbl_client ON client_clientid=subscription_clientid LEFT JOIN tbl_employee ON employee_employeeid=subscription_employeeid
setting.where: ('$subscription_clientid$' = '0' OR subscription_clientid = '$subscription_clientid$') AND ('$subscription_employeeid$' = '0' OR subscription_employeeid = '$subscription_employeeid$') AND ('$subscription_subscriptionstatusid$' = '0' OR subscription_subscriptionstatusid = '$subscription_subscriptionstatusid$') AND subscription_startdate BETWEEN '$subscription_startdate_from$' AND '$subscription_startdate_to$' AND subscription_enddate BETWEEN '$subscription_enddate_from$' AND '$subscription_enddate_to$' AND subscription_invoiceperiodfrom BETWEEN '$subscription_invoiceperiodfrom_from$' AND '$subscription_invoiceperiodfrom_to$' AND subscription_invoiceperiodto BETWEEN '$subscription_invoiceperiodto_from$' AND '$subscription_invoiceperiodto_to$' AND subscription_latestinvoicedate BETWEEN '$subscription_latestinvoicedate_from$' AND '$subscription_latestinvoicedate_to$' AND subscription_enddate BETWEEN '$subscription_enddate_from$' AND '$subscription_enddate_to$'
